driving_school_montana.name: MSU-Northern Traffic Education

traffic_education_minor_endorsement.description: MSU-Northern offers a Traffic Education minor/endorsement providing training for students planning to become qualified driving instructors. The minor/endorsement is achieved after the completion of 20 credits (12 required, 8 elective).

requirements.educator_license: A qualifying valid Montana educator license.
requirements.coursework: A minimum of 8 semester credits of the required initial coursework must be completed before teaching traffic education.
requirements.credits: 10 of the 20 credits earned must be MSU-Northern credits.
requirements.driver_license: A valid driver license with a verified acceptable driving record.

approval_process.after_coursework_completion: Apply to the Office of Public Instruction by completing the TE05 Application for Approval as a Teacher of Traffic Education.
approval_process.verification: The Traffic Education Office at OPI will verify educator license, driver license, and driving record.
approval_process.violation_criteria: Allowed no more than one moving traffic violation in any 12-month period of the previous 36 months and no DUI within the preceding 36 months, or other serious infraction.

traffic_education_minor_endorsement.additional_information: Additional information regarding the Traffic Education Endorsement is available online at the Montana Office of Public Instruction's website.

services.mission: MSU-Northern's Traffic Education Minor/Endorsement prepares 5-12 teachers to impart the knowledge, skills, and habits necessary for adolescent drivers to safely and effectively operate a motor vehicle.

driving_school_montana.contact_to_action: For more information or to enroll, please contact MSU-Northern at (406) 265-4148 or email sjappe@msun.edu.
usecases: Individuals planning to become qualified driving instructors
Teachers looking to impart traffic education knowledge and skills
driving_school_montana.solutions: Provides a comprehensive Traffic Education minor/endorsement program to train and prepare individuals to become qualified driving instructors and teachers of traffic education.
key_features: Summer course schedule for initial 8-credit coursework
Verification and approval process by the Office of Public Instruction

G1.courseTitle: Your Role in the Green Environment

usecases: Advancing to a First-Year Restricted License
Obtaining a Full Privilege Driver License
driving_school_montana.solutions: Providing a solution to help student drivers obtain a temporary learner's permit, guiding through the licensing process, and enforcing restrictions and penalties for teenage drivers

Learner's Permit Period: Study for the written driver's test using the Montana Driver's Manual
First-Year Restricted License: Complete and pass a drive test
Adhere to specific driving conditions and restrictions
Full Privilege Driver License: Automatic removal of Step 2 license restrictions on reaching a certain age or date

usecases: Class A and Class B CDL Training
Corporate Training for Companies and Fleets
driving_school_montana.solutions: SAGE Truck Driving Schools in Billings, MT offers hands-on CDL training programs, industry-leading equipment and facilities, certification for entry-level tractor trailer drivers, job placement assistance, and access to ProDriverU for additional endorsements. They also provide financial assistance and pre-hiring with major trucking companies.

key_features.Hands-On CDL Training: Ideal mix of classroom and hands-on training
key_features.Quick Program Completion: Programs can be completed in 4-8 weeks
key_features.Industry-Leading Equipment and Facilitie: Tractors and trailers used by leading trucking companies, premier driver training facilities
key_features.Certification for Entry-Level Tractor Tr: Upon successful completion of the program
key_features.Job Demand for Truck Drivers: High projected growth and exceptional job demand
key_features.CDL Jobs Pre-Hire Program: Many students get pre-hired by a major trucking company
key_features.On the Road Training for the MT CDL Test: Each student receives over the road training with an experienced instructor
key_features.Job Placement Assistance: Assistance with locating a job by taking advantage of their employer network
key_features.Total CDL Training Solution: Access to ProDriverU for additional endorsements and self-paced, high tech learning solutions
key_features.Rated #1 CDL School: Rated as #1 'Editors' Choice' school by TruckSchoolsUSA.com
key_features.Financial Assistance: Financial assistance is available for those who qualify
key_features.Pre-Hiring as a Truck Driver: They can get students pre-approved with major trucking companies before they start
